title: SoloRenektonOnly Needs A Ban
body: This dude's as toxic as Tyler1, and should be banned in the game to remove him from Twitch. He throws out bans for absolutely nothing, he's overly toxic, he smurfs in lower elos and calls people trash. Why anyone supports this guy, I've no idea. If you're in power, go view his channel on Twitch and see how toxic this guy is, and his mods aren't any better. The guy gets upset, people tell him to cheer up and he bans them over it. Sure you can do whatever you wish on Twitch for the most part, but being toxic in the game is no different from being toxic outside of the game. Everything carries over.

replies.body: Is he typing in the game being toxic? If the answer is no and he is only being toxic on stream by verbally saying shit; then probably 75% of the playerbase needs to be banned for saying shit to their monitor.
yes but 75% of the player-base aren't streaming their games to twitch and perpetuating the toxicity to their community. I actually like SROs content but my god he will literally ban you for anything
i wouldn't know. i usually avoid horrendlously popular streamers on twitch because the chat gets too spammy too quickly. i'd rather watch them on youtube.

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0tEq0E8Y,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-03-05T15:15:11.331+0000)
>
> i wouldn't know. i usually avoid horrendlously popular streamers on twitch because the chat gets too spammy too quickly. i'd rather watch them on youtube.

With sro its not to bad but y i avoid some popular streamers to cause of the chat gets to spammy like Tyler 1 or IwillDominate  were i nearly got time to read anything of the chat.

What people seem to forget is that Tyler1 was encouraging toxicity *in game* with his stream.

It doesn't make sense for Riot to ban people for how they interact with a subcommunity that opted into watching them. It doesn't make sense for Riot to ban some players for what they said in their microphone's range but not others.

what happens on twitch's medium is twitch's problem.
as long as he isnt verbally abusing people in the actual game, then its not really in riots place or control, being that as long as flame is kept out of the game, then his allies arent tilted by it, unless they decided to ghost his stream.

>but being toxic in the game is no different from being toxic outside of the game. Everything carries over.

you've obviously never met Tyler irl then
Who gives a shit what the guy does on his own twitch channel?

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0tEq0E8Y,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-05T14:51:41.414+0000)
>
> Who gives a shit what the guy does on his own twitch channel?

You would be suprised i got to day insulted by sombody who got banned. The person even wished me to die cause he got banned by SRO he even called me phetatic  and a kid  and said i abuse my mod while i dint had anything to do with hes ban at all.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
can you link your stream?

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0tEq0E8Y,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-03-05T15:05:05.028+0000)
>
> can you link your stream?

https://www.twitch.tv/solorenektononly Its this your afther ?

nah. my dad had no nose


https://imgur.com/gallery/vgGrprB
Sounds like you got banned from his channel.
T1 is reformed.

SRO told me to go find the nearest bridge, so I did!

Now what?

Now look at the stunning view and see how lucky you are to be alive right now. Let all of your toxic thoughts float away with the refreshing breeze and enjoy the sensation of positive thoughts entering your mind

is it a suspension bridge?

if yes, then walk a bass line on the cables
Jesus. Youre like those people who call in to complain about something someone said on the radio. How bout, stop watching it? Get a life? Do something else? God i hate your mentality.

Im a mod and what you say is a lie we dont throw bans  for absolute nothing.  i useally time them first out as a warning cause i believe in second changes only if sombody ruins the mood in chat or is anoying than y i ban but only if its absolute needed. Whats your name on twitch so i can see for what you got banned  to see if its really for absolute no reeason.

> [{quoted}](name=allaxxor,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0tEq0E8Y,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-16T11:11:16.623+0000)
>
> Okay, judge for yourself: First time i got timed out was, when he dodged a game and was sitting there for the whole time just starring into nothingness, not saying anything. I suggested he could do a little dance. It was supposed to be funny.  I could live with it, as it was only temporary and he was in a bad mood and we know how he is in these times.
> What got me permabanned though was a SINGLE TriHard-emote! I guess, the mods somehow saw it as racist. but it's a **** global emote, everybody can use it and it says nothing about my political views.
> I tried to contact some of the mods (why do i even care?), but instead of an answer they eventually opted me out so I can't whisper anyone anymore.
> So i got banned for a bad joke and an emote. Top notch!


Wtf ?  This over a month ago and  i dint even said anything here so how do you get that line here


edit wait nvm i see it now.

It's fine, you can delete it. It was rant. Watched him almost every day, before I got banned and it doesn't feel good if you get banned for nothing. Although I knew the day would come eventually, it hit me harder than I thought, cause now I can't watch him anymore. And I miss it but there are more important things.
Tyler1 is far more toxic. He's toxic and all that too but i don't think he needs a ban. I think his smurf accounts should be banned though. Not his main account. Smurfing is too toxic for league.

What lol.

It's his twitch channel, he can ban whoever he wants. 

I'm never toxic in chat or in my ingame behavior, but if I talked in chat the way I talk about my teammates to my friends I'd be banned on 20 different accounts.

Should I also be banned?

SRO should be banned from twitch. he literally gives no shit about his channel,never updated anything on it by any means,keeps letting his steam off by calling his viewers stupid dumb morons and ban them after he gets shit on by the enemy top-jungler.and only plays the good person while he records for his youtube.
in my opinion he should at least be given a warning by twitch staff.
Honestly any streamer who bans at all needs to be banned from league and twitch.

> [{quoted}](name=Brony Gaymer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0tEq0E8Y,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-05T15:11:35.180+0000)
>
> Honestly any streamer who bans at all needs to be banned from league and twitch.

I stream some, it isnt big at all but I try what I try. I had a dude come in and pretty much all he was talking about was him duoing to boost, had my mod drop the ban hammer on him fast because that isn't what I want in my chat if I do get larger, just people trying to get money by boosting
Preach!
